bibl.title: Three Sandalled Footlamps: Their Apotropaic Potentiality in the Cult of Sarapis.
bibl.note: Roman-Egyptian terracotta lamps. Egyptian Museum West Berlin. Inv. 9358; Detroit Institute of Art. Inv. 72. 425; Museum of Art and Archaeology, University of Missouri-Columbia. Catalogue 59.1.
Santoro L'Hoir Francesca, Three Sandalled Footlamps: Their Apotropaic Potentiality in the Cult of Sarapis.
